richTextConfig.content:
Process Tech

 

POSITION SUMMARY

 

Prepare machine for color or mold changes.  Required to do mold/machine start-ups.  Must maintain quality products from machines at all times.  Identifies mold/machine/color/resin problems.  Keep a continual open line of communication with supervisor.

 

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND REQUIREMENTS

1.  Sets machine controls to regulate molding temperature, volume, pressure, and time, according to your knowledge of plastics and molding procedures.

2.  Daily TPM’s on molds in their section.

3.  Maintain standard cycle times, standard cavitation and part quality.

4.  Observes and adjusts machine set up and operations to eliminate production of defective parts and products.

5.  Responsible for housekeeping of assigned areas.

6.  Relentless effort to reduce downtime, scrap and increase overall efficiency of machines.

7. Collect and analyze data to determine root cause and develop long term solutions.

8. Needs to have good knowledge of how an injection molding machine and injection mold functions.

 

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS

1.  Must be able to lift and/or move up to 30 lbs. and stand for an entire shift.

2.  Must have normal color vision and good communication skills.

3.  Commitment to quality performance and products and able to maintain production standards.

4.  Minimum of 3 years’ experience with Injection mold / machine start-up.

5.  Strong troubleshooting capabilities.

6. Able to work with minimal supervision, a self-starter who is highly motivated.

7. Must be able to read, write and speak English.

 

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS

Occasionally required to walk, stoop, kneel, or crawl.  Employee is frequently exposed to extreme temperatures in warehouse environment.  Frequently exposed to conditions typically found in a manufacturing plant: noise, dust, heat, and chemicals.

 

If you have the background and experience we're seeking, please email your resume to resume@petmate.com. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. Drug Free Workplace EEOC M/F/D/V
